name: Labyrinth Keeper
description: The Labyrinth Keeper is a Large Monstrosity with exceptional strength and spellcasting abilities, embodying chaos and evil.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate its labyrinth and use spellcasting makes it a versatile and dangerous opponent.
goals: To protect its maze-like territory and eliminate intruders.
relations: Commonly associated with other chaotic evil creatures.
environment: Typically found within complex mazes or labyrinths.
strengths: Strong melee attacks combined with powerful spellcasting.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it vulnerable to attacks.
attacks: Can deliver a devastating gore attack and follow up with a quick shortsword strike.
most_powerful_ability: Reckless Caster allows it to have advantage on spell attacks at a cost.
senses: Has darkvision to see in low-light conditions and a high passive Perception of 17.
skills: Possesses strong perception skills with a +7 bonus.
additional_information: Charge ability enhances its melee damage while altering battlefield dynamics.
Labyrinthine Recall skill enables it to navigate its territory effortlessly.
Innate spellcasting allows flexibility in both combat and utility.
Can cast various spells at will, including damaging and utility spells.
Dual-attack capability with both gore and shortsword increases its offensive options.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with spells including acid arrow, fire bolt, and misty step.
